parameters: \pop[2]We make our way back outside, and the group is waiting for us.
\pop[2]Almost immediately, we gather together and start chatting.
\pop[4]Had to end the year on a pretty high note, you know?
I just wanted to talk for a bit.
\pop[4]Anyway, I wanted to do something special for the finale.
Especially since fourth midnight is actually \c[14]our\c[14] midnight.
\pop[4]I had to pull some strings, but I think you'll enjoy this.
It's something that only \c[14]I\c[0] could've done.
\pop[3]When you say that, I'm filled with anxiety.
\pop[4]You gotta start giving me some more credit.
Red or green. Pick your favorite.
\pop[4]I thought it was a pretty simple question.
\pop[2]He smiles, and takes out his phone.
\pop[2]Without saying anything, he just starts tapping away.
\pop[3]Gotta say, I don't like the suspense.
\pop[2]He continues using his phone for about another minute.
\pop[3]That isn't gonna help with the suspense part.
I worked on this for a week straight.
\pop[2]We all do as we're told, and close our eyes.
\pop[2]I have no idea what to expect, but my anticipation rises.
\pop[2]Isaac certainly had to live up to some high expectations.
\pop[2]I start to hear noises. Buzzing, and mechanical whirring.
\pop[2]I'd recognize that noise anywhere. It's the sound of \c[23]Argus\c[0] drones.
\pop[2]Part of me knew this surprise would involve them. But I couldn't tell the others.
\pop[2]I feel like Isaac would hate me if he knew I went into his workshop.
\pop[2]But it was a genuine mistake. I have to stop beating myself up over this stuff.
\pop[2]I open my eyes, and I'm greeted to a beautiful sight.
\pop[2]Drones fly around the sky above the house, each with dazzling lights.
\pop[2]They dance and sway, in different formations. It's almost hypnotic.
\pop[2]Isaac must've programmed this light show just for us.
\pop[4]Like I said, I had to pull some strings.
But \c[23]Argus\c[0] ended up giving me the approval.
\pop[2]We stand there, watching the light show in awe.
\pop[2]Isaac steps aside, and returns with a six-pack of drinks.
\pop[4]One more for the end of the year...?
\pop[2]We all take a can, and crack it open.
\pop[2]The drones are such a mystifying sight. I can't take my eyes off of them.
\pop[2]And not only that, but it's truly a testament to Isaac's mastery of the tech.
\pop[2]He presses a button on his phone, and six drones fly above the rest.
\pop[2]We look straight up, watching them against the backdrop of the twilight.
\pop[2]The stars are slowly coming out, and the lights on the drones blend right in.
\pop[2]But soon after, the lights on them change color.
\pop[2]They continue their intricate movements, almost forming a rainbow.
\pop[3]What a way to end the year...
Just like you said. Right, Dante?
\pop[3]I could go without the implication that we're all dead.
Imagine the adventures we'll get up to as we sail those stars.
\pop[3]It means a lot that you'd embrace our ways like this.
Not everybody shares our views on the night sky.
\pop[4]A lot better than being six-feet-under, if you ask me.
\pop[2]We all sip our drinks as the light show continues.
\pop[2]Isaac simply smirks, and taps his phone once more.
\pop[2]The drones move into a large square formation, and their lights turn off.
\pop[2]As the partygoers start to count down, certain drones light up.
\pop[2]He's using their lights to form a countdown timer.
\pop[2]It's almost as if the sky itself is ringing in the new year with us.
\pop[2]Everyone shouts it together, and holds up their drinks.
\pop[2]Isaac hits a button on his phone, and the drones softly land.
\pop[2]Isaac smiles at me, and holds out his hand.
\pop[2]I place mine in his, and he looks up at the drones.
\pop[2]In his other hand, he's still operating his phone.
\pop[2]He presses a few more buttons on it, and takes me to the center of the yard.
\pop[7]This part is special, just for us.
\pop[2]He blushes, as several of the drones return to the sky, and start shifting around.
\pop[2]Then, they form a large heart in the sky, before bringing themselves lower.
\pop[2]Then, the lights slowly shift to the most beautiful red.
\pop[7]As weird as the last couple weeks have been...
They've definitely been the best in my life.
\pop[2]He puts his phone away, and holds out his other hand.
\pop[2]I hold them both tightly, as we gaze into each other's eyes.
\pop[7]I feel like my whole life led up to the moment we first met.
Not online, but the first time I saw you at the airport.
\pop[7]It felt like time stood still. I couldn't get over how pretty you were...
It's frozen in my mind, as if that was the moment my life began.
\pop[2]Almost in unison, both of our eyes start to water.
\pop[7]I wish \c[14]that\c[0] was my vision, so I could relive it every day.
That one, perfect moment, where everything felt right.
No uncertainty. No fright. Just... us.
\pop[7]You're the best thing that's ever happened to me, Delta.
I'm so glad that you feel the same way. It makes me feel... whole.
\pop[7]Maybe for the first time in my life.
\pop[7]No matter what I do, our bond will always be my greatest achievement.
All I can hope for, is that one day, I'll make you \c[14]just\c[0] as happy.
\pop[7]Well then, I'm glad to hear it...
\pop[2]He slowly leans in for a kiss, and I do the same.
\pop[2]Our lips lock together for the first time, under the crimson light of the drones.
\pop[2]One of his hands raises up, and softly strokes the side of my face.
\pop[2]We stay like this for a while, until he finally pulls back.
Let's make this the best year of our lives.
\pop[2]He smiles, as we head back toward our friends, holding hands.
\pop[3]Wow, and \c[14]I'm\c[0] the one that writes romance.
\pop[3]I think I almost started to cry...
Seeing the both of you so close...
I just spoke from the heart.
\pop[2]We all exchange glances, and smile at one another.
\pop[2]The year was over, and we hung on the precipice of a new beginning.
\pop[2]It was a moment where \c[14]anything\c[0] seemed possible, as long as we stuck together.
\pop[2]As if to ruin our perfect memory, though, we hear a collective gasp of shock.
\pop[2]But a moment later, the hopeful atmosphere of the party is completely destroyed.
\pop[2]As if to ruin our perfect moment, we hear a collective gasp of shock.
